remarks: Lemma for ~ dvres .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2016.)
statement:
dvres.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvres.t $e |- T = ( K |`t S ) $.
dvres.g $e |- G = ( z e. ( A \ { x } ) |-> ( ( ( F ` z ) - ( F ` x ) ) / ( z - x ) ) ) $.
dvres.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
dvres.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
dvres.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
dvres.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ S ) $.
dvres.y $e |- ( ph -> y e. CC ) $.
dvreslem $p |- ( ph -> ( x ( S _D ( F |` B ) ) y <-> ( x ( S _D F ) y /\ x e. ( ( int ` T ) ` B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d K z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph z $.
